title: Pledge
description: The Soulmate bond happens only once every few millennia, and the last person the demon prince Olympio expects after all that time is a mortal. And not just any mortal. A trust fund frat boy.But the Soulmate bond is never wrong, and Olympio’s faith in the ancient magic is pushed to its limits. Gabriel has no interest in cooperating, but if he doesn’t, Olympio, his family, and the whole of his realm Sefaera are in danger of a coup.And the rumors swirl of a family who is itching to unseat him...
author: Eleanor  Rose
